_header: Blissful Lord on high what shall I do
Title(s): Piteous Complaint of the Soul (Pèlerinage de l’âme)
_description: The Piteous Complaint of the Soul, in the English translation of Deguileville’s Pélerinage de l’Ame — fifty-two stanzas rhyme royal

Bod770.First Lines:
O blisful lord an hyegh what schal y door in what place may y my
                    self hide…
Bod770.Last Lines:
…Among the nedy forto be despendidLet myn estate with somwhat
                    ben amendid
Bod770.Attributed Title: The pitevous compleint of þe soule (f. 7rb)

OxfCCC237.First Lines:
O blisseful lord an high wat schall I door in wat place may I my
                    sylfe hide…
OxfCCC237.Last Lines:
…Amonge þe nedy for to be dyspendidlat myn estate with
                    sumwat bene amendid

CULKk17.First Lines:
blysful lord an hy what schal I doOr in what place may I my self
                    hide…
CULKk17.Last Lines:
…Among þe nedy for to be dispendidLate myn estate with
                    somwhat ben amendid
CULKk17.Attributed Title:
Incipit liber qui nuncupatur Grace dieu (f. 1); her endith þe
                    drem of þe pilgrimage of þe soule (f. 124v)

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
O blissede lorde on hye what shall I dooOr in what place may I my
                    selue hyde…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…Amonge þe nedy for to be dispendedeLette myn astate be
                    sum whatt amendede
BLAdd34193.Attributed Title: The peteuous complayn of þe saule (f. 11v)

BLEge615.First Lines: Blisful lord on heigh what schall I door in what place may I my selfe hide…
BLEge615.Last Lines: …Among the nedi to be dispendedLet myn estate somwhat be amendid
BLEge615.Note: Table of contents ff. 1-4v; prose introduction ff. 5-8.
BLEge615.Attributed Title: This is the kalender of the book caled Grace de dieu (f. 1)
BLEge615.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             “Hoccleve’s Works: The Regement of Princes and fourteen minor
                poems.” 
             EETS
         e.s. 72 (1897); repr. 1988: li-lxii.

NYPLSpenc19.First Lines:
Blisful lord an high what shall I dOr in what place may I my self
                    hide…
NYPLSpenc19.Last Lines:
…Among the nedy for to be despendedLet myn estaat with somwhat
                    ben amended
NYPLSpenc19.Attributed Title: The pitouse compleynt of the soule (f. 14)
